name: The Skater
description:
Skate across the tiny world! 

For a perfect run try beating the game without restarting or skipping any levels!

Restarting the levels with R will reset your deaths and time, but will remove the Perfect run indicator on the win screen.

Skipping levels with Tab will result in the skipped levels times and deaths not being shown on the win screen. 

For the brave press ctrl+SPACE at the win screen to enter Hard Mode!

Music and sfx from:

https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

Made in one week for the Gotm.io jam #3.

Controls:

-D to Push

-A to Break

-W or SPACE to Jump

-Land on rails to Grind

-R to restart level

-TAB to skip to next level
